listings.name: MYRIADE - Quartier des spectacles - Condos for rent
listings.description:
Condo Apartment/appartement for rent/à louer-Studio, 3 1/2, 4 1/2, 3.5, 4.5, 1-2-3 bedroom/chambre, Penthouse, Quartier des Spectacles, Esplanade Tranquille, UQAM, Metro St-Laurent & Place des Arts, McGill, CHUM, Centre-Ville Montréal

Condo appartements à louer à Montréal dans l'arrondissement Ville-Marie.

Le loyer comprend :

  • Électricité, le chauffage, la climatisation, l'eau chaude
  • Électroménagers en acier inoxydable, y compris laveuse / sécheuse
  • Des finitions hautes de gamme
  • Les stores et les fixtures de luminaire
  • Salle d’entrainement tout équipée
  • Piscine extérieure
  • Stationnement intérieur disponible ($), entreposage disponible ($)

Saisissez l'opportunité d’habiter l’un des quartiers les plus en vue du centre-ville de Montréal. Le MYRIADE - Prestigieux immeuble érigé face à l'Esplanade Tranquille au coeur du Quartier des Spectacles. Le bâtiment dispose d'une variété d'équipements haute de gamme, comprenant une piscine, une salle de gym et terrasse. Le projet est en face de la station de métro Saint-Laurent. Des vues incroyables dans tous les directions et Esplanade Tranquille.

FAITES VITE! PRENEZ RENDEZ-VOUS AVEC NOTRE AGENT DE LOCATION.

SVP envoyez un courriel pour plus d'information ou appeler 438-409-4692 pour réserver votre unité.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Condo apartments for rent in Ville-Marie- Quartier des Spectacles

The rent includes:

  • Electricity, heating, air conditioning, hot water
  • Stainless-steel appliances, and washer & dryer
  • High-end finishes
  • Blinds and light fixtures
  • Fully-equipped gym
  • Outdoor pool
  • Indoor parking available ($), storage lockers available ($)

Dont miss out the opportunity to rent at the most sought-after rental project in Ville-Marie. MYRIADE - Prestigious building facing Esplanade Tranquille in the heart of the Quartier des Spectacles. The building features a variety of upscale amenities, including a pool, gym and terrace. The project is facing Saint-Laurent metro station. Amazing views of Montreal in every direction and Esplanade Tranquille.

HURRY & DON'T DELAY! BOOK AN APPOINTMENT TO VISIT & LEASE YOUR NEW HOME TODAY.

Please email us for more details or call 438-409-4692


MONDEV.CA

listings.name: Encore Luxury Apartments
listings.description:
RENT SPECIALS AVAILABLE!  Ask us for more details.

VIRTUAL tours are available via Skype, Whatsapp or Facetime
VIDEOS available upon request

New Luxury Rental Residences

As part of Encore's hotel lifestyle, a 24/7 doorman and a full-time concierge are at your service offering house-keeping services, dry cleaning. Encore's elegantly furnished lobby features imported Italian marble desk, bespoke custom stylish seating area with fireplace overlooking the classic Manhattan inspired exterior entrance, which makes for a distinguished arrival.

Over 7,000 square feet of expansive amenities offer seamless flow of indoor and outdoor entertainment. The Encore club lounge dedicated exclusively to residents, has a wide-screen television, lounge seating, BBQ area and designated work spaces. Encore provides a state of the art fitness center, relaxation corners and interior pool, providing a tranquil swim with unparalleled city views and abundant natural light.

5 new high end stainless steel appliances included
In suite laundry with state of the art washer and dryer
Keyless Entry
Custom privacy blinds
Superior sound proofing quality
Hot water, electricity, heating and air conditioning charges included
Complimentary wifi in all common areas
Two steps away from UQAM, McGill and Concordia Universities.
Close to grocery stores, pharmacies, coffee shops, restaurants, depanneur, banks and parks
Walking distance to shops and public transport with a 100 percent Walk Score
Interior Garage + storage (optional $),
Monthly complementary events.

Encore Residences offers both furnished and unfurnished apartments

Learn more at liveatencore. com

 

Encore occupies one of the most desirable locations in downtown Montreal. Within minutes, residents will arrive to the most fine grocery stores, local markets, art galleries, boutiques, world-class dining experiences, night life, spas and public transit services.

Close proximity to:

  • Old Montreal
  • Mcgill, Concordia and UQUAM university
  • Bicycle path, Bixi stations & green spaces
  • Public transportation, central station & highway
  • Hospitals
  • Imax theatre, Bell centre
  • High end fitness centers & Spas
  • Restaurants, nightclubs
  • Corner René Lévesque and Bleury
  • Walking distance to Quartier Des Spectacles

listings.name: Le Duke
listings.description:
Located at the centre of one of Montreals liveliest downtown neighbourhoods, Le Duke offers first-class amenities and living conditions. The historic building, which was once a financial institution, has been transformed into a stunning 25-storey residential tower. Special care has been taken to preserve the existing buildings heritage while keeping an eye towards the future. 

Tenants can benefit from a beautiful IGA directly inside the building.

Apartments come with all top of the line appliances (Stove, Refrigerator, Dishwasher & Washer and Dryer.)

All utilities are included (Heating, Hot Water & Electricity)

Points of Interest:

  •   PARC BONAVENTURE – 140 M
  •   PLACE BONAVENTURE – 700 M
  •   ATRIUM LE 1000 – 850 M
  •   ÉCOLE DE TECHNOLOGIE SUPÉRIEUR ETS – 550 M
  •   ADONIS – 500 M
  •   SCOTIABANK CINEMA MONTREAL – 550 M
  •   LA MAISON SIMONS – 1 300 M
  •   LES COURS MONT-ROYAL – 1 700 M
  •   PLACE VILLE-MARIE – 1 100 M
  •   GARE-CENTRAL – 800 M
  •   PHARMAPRIX – 600 M

Beautiful apartments for rent in the heart of Old Montreal

loft: $800/ month Available ASAP

For your convenience, you are minutes from Place-d'Armes metro station, which leads to all parts of the city. In the heart of old MTL.

-Close to many bars, shops, restaurants

listings.name: Le St-Regis - Douek.ca
listings.description:
Brokers Protected

~ Simply Spectacular Furnished 2,275 Sqft. Old Montreal Loft ~

The Building:

Live in one of the most prestigious buildings in Old Montreal, Le St-Regis, at 275 St-Jacques.

Le St- Regis was erected in 1894 as the Canada Life Building, In 2001, the nine-story building was converted into nine exclusive, luxury residential lofts. 

Your New Home:

This 2,300 sqft. furnished corner unit loft is graced with soaring ceilings, century metal columns, and beautiful woodwork. The large windows let in abundant light with panoramic views of Old Montreal’s iconic architecture. 

Minimalism and simplicity are the key design elements to this beautifully furnished loft, which has an expansive dining area and chef’s kitchen, including top-of-the-line appliances and a wine cooler.

Residents of the St-Regis enjoy the convenience of two elevators, doorman and valet parking. 

Other inclusions integrated into the apartment are as follows; 

  • Bang & Olufsen Home Theatre System
  • 55” Samsung 4K Frame TV in the living-room
  • In-ceiling SONOS sound system throughout the unit
  • Automated blinds
  • Concealed projector system in the bedroom area
  • High-Speed Fibre-Optic Internet
  • Lutron Lighting System
  • Video intercom access system for the front door

This property is professionally managed to the highest standard by Douek Apartments - Douek.ca/Rent

--------------------

Brokers Protected

listings.name: GRIFFIN SQUARE-Condos Locatifs Griffintown
listings.description:
**PROMOTION: Receive 3 months free. *Certain conditions apply. For a limited time only.**

**PROMOTION : Recevez 3 mois gratuits. *Certaines conditions s’appliquent. Pour un temps limité seulement**

GRIFFIN SQUARE: VIVEZ LE NOUVEL ANGLE DE GRIFFINTOWN

Maintenant en location : Phase 1 / Tour B. Occupation juillet 2022

Le Griffin Square s’installe à l’angle des rues Peel et Ottawa. Un concept d’habitation unique ou cohabitent de lumineux appartements, des commerces de commodités dans la galerie commerciale, des superbes aires communes de style, ainsi qu’une cour intérieure qui invite à la détente.

Griffintown est l’endroit de prédilection pour les citoyens du monde qui aspirent à une vie riche en expériences urbaines et humaines. Vous y trouverez une multitude de restos branchés, de bars, de boutiques design et déco, de café-bistrots et de petites épiceries de quartier. Sans compter les attractions du canal Lachine et de ses nombreuses possibilités, les parcs, l’esplanade Robert Bourassa et ses oeuvres d’art urbaines.

Les Studios & unités 1 chambre offrent:

• 5 électroménagers tous neufs et modernes (frigo, poele, lave-vaiselle, laveuse/sécheuse)

• L’électricité, chauffage, eau chaude et climatisation inclus

• Des espaces communs luxueux :

- Une piscine exterieure dans la cour interieure

- Lounge terrasse sur le toit au 19e étage

- Salle d’entrainement toute équipé

- Espace lounge intérieur

- Espace coworking

• Le bâtiment offre un accès rapide au parc municipal, aux commerces situés au rez-de-chaussée, et à plusieurs commerces qui entourent le développement.

Stationnement & locker disponible ($)

Ne manquez pas l’opportunité de vivre dans le meilleur projet locatif dans le meilleur quartier de Montréal.

CONTACTEZ-NOUS pour plus d’informations: GRIFFINSQUARE.CA

438-378-7542 / stephen@mondev.ca

.

GRIFFIN SQUARE: EXPERIENCE THE NEW ANGLE OF GRIFFINTOWN

Now renting: Phase 1 / Tour B. Occupancy July 2022

Griffin Square is located at the angle of Peel and Ottawa streets. A unique way of living where luxurious apartments, amenities and services, incredibly stylish common areas and an interior courtyard coexist to encourage relaxation and convenience.

Griffintown is the go-to place for the globetrotting citizen that craves a rich lifestyle full of urban and social experiences. You’ll find an endless amount of trendy restaurants, bars, design and deco boutiques, café-bistros, and neighborhood grocery stores. All while having the Lachine Canal’s attractions, the numerous parks, and Robert Bourassa’s urban art fixtures at your fingertips.

The Studios, 1- bedroom units offer:

• 5 brand-new and modern appliances (fridge, stove, dishwasher, washer/dryer)

• Electricity, heating, hot water, and a/c included

• Luxurious common spaces:

- Outdoor pool in the courtyard

- Rooftop terrace lounge

- Fully-equipped fitness room

- Indoor lounge space

- Coworking space

• The building offers quick access to the adjacent municipal park, to the retail stores and shops located on the ground floor, and to the businesses and services that surround the development.

Parking and locker available ($)

Don’t miss out on the opportunity to live in the best rental complex in the best district of Montreal.

CONTACT US NOW for more information: GRIFFINSQUARE.CA

438-378-7542 / stephen@mondev.ca

listings.name: BRiX MTL
listings.description:
About Brix:

Located in the heart of the Ville-Marie district in Montreal. Enjoy the opportunity to live within walking distance of the Quartier des Spectacles. Experience the hustle and bustle of downtown, with access to public transit at Place des Armes or Place des Arts metro stations and the pedestrian area of Saint-Catherine Street. In addition, BRiX offers an exceptional view of downtown and the Jacques-Cartier Bridge.

  • All stainless steel appliances and washer and dryer supplied
  • Concrete ceilings
  • Blinds
  • Electricity
  • A/C (Central)
  • Heating and Hot water included
  • Internet
  • Gym
  • Sky-Lounge
  • Outdoor Pool
  • BBQ Area
  • Game room and Cinema

The Quartier des Spectacles is Montreal's cultural and entertainment district. Depending on the season, it vibrates to the rhythm of several festivals and outdoor events. The Place des Festivals presents public art and light show events. Through a multitude of services and events, Ville-Marie is a complete neighbourhood where everyone can find something for everyone.

description de la propriété:

Situé au coeur du quartier Ville-Marie, à Montréal. Saisissez l'opportunité d'habiter à quelques pas du Quartier des Spectacles. Vivez la frénésie du centre-ville, avec l'accessibilité au transport en commun du métro Place des Armes ou métro Place des Arts et à lespace piétonnière de la rue Saint-Catherine. En plus, BRiX offre une vue exceptionnelle sur le centre-ville et sur le pont Jacques-Cartier.

  • Tous les électroménagers en acier inoxydable et laveuse et sécheuse fournis
  • Cuisines modernes avec comptoir en quartz
  • Plafonds en béton
  • Des luminaires
  • Des habillages de fenêtres
  • Électricité
  • Climatisation centrale
  • Chauffage et eau chaude incluses
  • Internet
  • Gym
  • Sky-Lounge
  • Piscine Exterieur
  • BBQ Area
  • Game room et Cinema

Le Quartier des Spectacles est le quartier de Montréal riche en culture et divertissement. Suivant les saisons, il vibre au rythme de plusieurs festivals et événements en plein air. La Place des Festivals présente des évènements d'art public et de jeu de lumière. À travers une multitude de services et d'événements, Ville-Marie est un quartier complet où chacun y trouve son compte.
listings.metaTitle: BRiX MTL | 1090 rue de Bleury, Montreal
listings.metaDesc: About Brix: Located in the heart of the Ville-Marie district in Montreal. Enjoy the opportunity to live within walking distance of the Quartier des Spectacles. Experience the hustle and bustle of downtown, with access to public transit at Place des Armes or Place des Arts metro stations and the pede

listings.name: Le Duke
listings.description: Located on the border of Montréal’s Old Port and Griffintown neighbourhood, Le Duke offers first-class amenities and living conditions. The historic building, which was once a financial institution, has been transformed into a stunning 25-storey residential tower. Access to Highway 10, Ville-Marie Expressway, and public transportation simplifies traveling to and from the building.
listings.metaTitle: Le Duke | 790 Rue William, Montreal

listings.name: C-Lofts
listings.description: The C-Lofts is nestled at the corner of Rue de la Concorde and Rue de Bleury. Its location near the heart of downtown Montréal’s Quartier des Spectacles makes it one of most invigorating places to call home. Public transportation is just a few steps away and access by car via the Ville-Marie Expressway is nearby.

listings.name: Le V
listings.description: Located at the corner of René-Lévesque St. W and Rue Anderson, Le V is in one of the most lively areas in the city of Montreal and is coupled with the top-rated Courtyard by Marriott Montreal Downtown hotel. In the heart of downtown, you will be close to a wide option of services, boutiques, restaurants, museums and events including the Le complex Desjardins shopping centre and le Quartier des spectacles.

listings.name: 3420 Sainte-famille
listings.description:
Heating, hot water, electricity included in the price - 3min McGill university 

Studio and 1 bedroom apartment (3 1/2) in the McGill Ghetto : 3420 Sainte-Famille

Apartments located in Downtown Montreal. Fridge and strove included. Washer/dryer in the building. 

Excellent location in the heart of downtown/McGill Ghetto:
3 min. walk to McGill Campus
3min. Walk to Place-des-Arts metro
18 min. walk to Concordia University
4 min. walk to 4 grocery stores including metro, Provigo.

Walk to Eaton Centre with many stores and food court options - Bixi station around the corner
Parking available ($). 

Text Rand: 514 9967677 with the address: 3420 Sainte-Famille

Located in the center of Montreal nearby metro Place des Arts
Nearest Cross Street: Sherbrook west

Clubs, bars and restaurants are all within minutes of walking-- Apartment is located 2 streets away from St Laurent boulevard, 2 streets away from St Catherine street.

listings.name: Griffintown Apartment-Hotel
listings.description:
Welcome the Griffintown Apartment-Hotel, 1222 rue des Bassins FURNISHED UNITS. Luxuriously appointed one- or two-bedroom apartments with all the amenities and services that you expect from a hotel.  

Featuring modern finishes, high-end kitchen, marble counters, an open-concept layout, balconies and wall to wall fenestration that bathes the space with natural light.  

Luxuriously appointed design with high-end materials;  

  • Built-in appliances
  • A/C in all units
  • 24h security and front desk
  • Units with balconies
  • Washer and dryer included
  • Indoor parking available $$
  • Pets are welcome for a $45 fee per stay
  • Cleaning, change of beddings and towels for $40 per week PLUS TAXES

Located across a Park, minutes away from public transport, grocery stores, and restaurants!  

** The pictures are not the exact representation of each unit
